courses.name: Introduction to React Native
courses.description: Learn the basics of React Native development and build your first mobile app.

syllabus.content: Overview of React Native, setting up your development environment.
Creating a simple mobile app using React Native components.

courses.name: Advanced React Development
courses.description: Dive deeper into React concepts and advanced development techniques.

syllabus.content: Exploring higher-order components and render props.
Implementing Redux for global state management.

courses.name: JavaScript Fundamentals for Beginners
courses.description: Master the core concepts of JavaScript programming language.

syllabus.content: Understanding variables, data types, and operators.
Working with functions, scope, and closures.

courses.name: Python for Data Science
courses.description: Learn Python programming for data analysis and visualization.

syllabus.content: Introduction to Python syntax and data structures.
Working with Pandas library for data manipulation.

courses.name: Web Development Bootcamp
courses.description: Comprehensive course covering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for web development.

syllabus.content: Introduction to HTML tags and structure.

courses.name: Machine Learning Basics
courses.description: An introductory course to machine learning algorithms and concepts.

syllabus.content: Understanding machine learning and its types.
Exploring linear regression in machine learning.
